Name: New Year's Eve Miracle
About the game: Everyone in the magical winter forest is making preparations for a New Year celebration. Mousekin can't wait for his favorite holiday because on this day one's dearest wish will definitely come true. This is a short cute visual novel about New Year's magic, friendship and miracles.
